lyrics:
6 contributorsbe somebody lyricsverse 1
taking to the floor with the reach to the sky
i loosen my tie i loosen my tie
locking down the door with the rhythm and rhyme
i loosen my tie i loosen my tie

verse 2
trying to recall what you want me to say
i shake your way i shake your way
counting on the night for a beautiful day
i shake your way i shake your way

refrain
and i say you cant get enough
no you cant get enough

chorus
given a chance
im gonna be somebody
if for one dance
im gonna be somebody
open the door
its gonna make you love me
facing the floor
im gonna be somebody
see kings of leon liveget tickets as low as 117you might also likeverse 3
now is your time and you know where you stand
with a gun in your hand with a gun in your hand
now im no longer an ordinary man
was this your big plan your gun in your hand

refrain
and i say you cant get enough
no you cant get enough cant get enough

chorus
given a chance
im gonna be somebody
if for one dance

its gonna make you love me
